experiences: At Accenture, I started as an Application Development Associate with training in Azure and web technologies, before being promoted to Packaged App Development Analyst. I developed advanced data visualizations and dynamic dashboards to aid business decision-making, integrated KPIs for real-time performance tracking, and managed SQL databases for accurate data handling. Additionally, I supported the deployment and configuration of application releases, ensuring smooth integration and enhancing overall reliability. My role also involved optimizing interactive dashboards and graphs to improve data insights.

During my internship, I developed an Employee Portal that improved internal communication and workflow. I implemented features like user authentication, role-based access control, and data management. I conducted thorough testing and debugging to ensure the portal's stability and performance, and contributed to technical documentation, including system architecture, code comments, and user guides.
